title: WHAT IS IDEOLOGY? With Matto Mildenberger And Jonathan Leader Maynard
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: What is an ideology?  What do intellectuals studying it in opinion polls, contemporary debates, and historical texts understand it to mean? I’m joined by the authors of a recent survey of the study of ideology in different disciplines, Matto Mildenberger and Jonathan Leader Maynard, to help make sense of it all.
itunes:subtitle: What is an ideology?  What do intellectuals study…
